stimulusHtml: Which of the following best captures the significance of the image?

features.html:
Photo by HUM Images/Universal Images Group via Getty Images

American engineer, physician, and NASA astronaut. She became the first Black woman to travel in space when she served as an astronaut aboard the Space Shuttle Endeavour.

choicesHtml: African American women could work in scientific fields before they were given the right to vote.
African American women began participating in the sciences after the integration of public universities.
African American women have made important contributions to science and technology.
African American women lobbied Congress to allow Black women to become astronauts.
